title: Preferred social login ID worldwide 2016
summary: This statistic shows the regional 2016 of ID social login ID logins in 2016 .
About 53.1 logins with login assets of at least 50 million U.S. dollars were residing in Facebook 2016 .
That is about 50 % of the total Share of logins worldwide .
gold: This statistic gives information on the preferred social login ID used by internet users worldwide.
During the second quarter of 2016 , data analysis revealed that 53.1 percent of social logins were through a Facebook account.
Approximately one percent of internet users used their Twitter account to login to a website .
